   19: 
   20: -module(erl_eval_SUITE).
   21: -export([all/0, suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1, 
   22: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   23: 	 init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2]).
   24: 
   25: -export([guard_1/1, guard_2/1,
   26: 	 match_pattern/1,
   27: 	 match_bin/1,
   28: 	 string_plusplus/1,
   29: 	 pattern_expr/1,
   30:          guard_3/1, guard_4/1,
   31:          lc/1,
   32:          zlc/1,
   33:          zbc/1,
   34:          zmc/1,
   35:          simple_cases/1,
   36:          unary_plus/1,
   37:          apply_atom/1,
   38:          otp_5269/1,
   39:          otp_6539/1,
   40:          otp_6543/1,
   41:          otp_6787/1,
   42:          otp_6977/1,
   43: 	 otp_7550/1,
   44:          otp_8133/1,
   45:          funs/1,
   46: 	 try_catch/1,
   47: 	 eval_expr_5/1,
   48:          eep37/1]).
   49: 
   50: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   51: 
   52: -import(lists,[concat/1, sort/1]).
   53: 
   54: -export([count_down/2, count_down_fun/0, do_apply/2,
   55:          local_func/3, local_func_value/2]).
   56: 
   57: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
   58:     test_lib:interpret(?MODULE),
   59:     Config.
   60: 
   61: end_per_testcase(_Case, _Config) ->
   62:     ok.
   63: 
   64: suite() ->
   65:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   66:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   67: 
   68: all() -> 
   69:     [guard_1, guard_2, match_pattern, string_plusplus,
   70:      pattern_expr, match_bin, guard_3, guard_4,
   71:      lc, zlc, zbc, zmc,
   72:      simple_cases, unary_plus, apply_atom, otp_5269,
   73:      otp_6539, otp_6543, otp_6787, otp_6977, otp_7550,
   74:      otp_8133, funs, try_catch, eval_expr_5, eep37].
   75: 
   76: groups() -> 
   77:     [].
   78: 
   79: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   80:     Config.
   81: 
   82: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   83:     ok.
   84: 
   85: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   86:     Config.
   87: 
   88: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   89:     Config.
   90: 
   91: 
   92: %% (OTP-2405).
   93: guard_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   94:     {ok,Tokens ,_} =
   95: 	erl_scan:string("if a+4 == 4 -> yes; true -> no end. "),
   96:     {ok, [Expr]} = erl_parse:parse_exprs(Tokens),
   97:     no = guard_1_compiled(),
   98:     {value, no, []} = erl_eval:expr(Expr, []),
   99:     ok.
  100: 
  101: guard_1_compiled() ->
  102:     if a+4 == 4 -> yes; true -> no end.
  103: 
  104: %% Similar to guard_1, but type-correct.
  105: guard_2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  106:     {ok,Tokens ,_} =
  107: 	erl_scan:string("if 6+4 == 4 -> yes; true -> no end. "),
  108:     {ok, [Expr]} = erl_parse:parse_exprs(Tokens),
  109:     no = guard_2_compiled(),
  110:     {value, no, []} = erl_eval:expr(Expr, []),
  111:     ok.
  112: 
  113: guard_2_compiled() ->
  114:     if 6+4 == 4 -> yes; true -> no end.
  115: 
  116: %% OTP-3069: syntactic sugar string ++ ...
  117: string_plusplus(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  118:     check(fun() -> case "abc" of "ab" ++ L -> L end end,
  119: 	  "case \"abc\" of \"ab\" ++ L -> L end. ",
  120: 	  "c"),
  121:     check(fun() -> case "abcde" of "ab" ++ "cd" ++ L -> L end end,
  122: 	  "case \"abcde\" of \"ab\" ++ \"cd\" ++ L -> L end. ",
  123: 	  "e"),
  124:     check(fun() -> case "abc" of [97, 98] ++ L -> L end end,
  125: 	  "case \"abc\" of [97, 98] ++ L -> L end. ",
  126: 	  "c"),
  127:     ok.
  128: 
  129: %% OTP-2983: match operator in pattern.
  130: match_pattern(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  131:     check(fun() -> case {a, b} of {a, _X}=Y -> {x,Y} end end,
  132: 	  "case {a, b} of {a, X}=Y -> {x,Y} end. ",
  133: 	  {x, {a, b}}),
  134:     check(fun() -> case {a, b} of Y={a, _X} -> {x,Y} end end,
  135: 	  "case {a, b} of Y={a, X} -> {x,Y} end. ",
  136: 	  {x, {a, b}}),
  137:     check(fun() -> case {a, b} of Y={a, _X}=Z -> {Z,Y} end end,
  138: 	  "case {a, b} of Y={a, X}=Z -> {Z,Y} end. ",
  139: 	  {{a, b}, {a, b}}),
  140:     check(fun() -> A = 4, B = 28, <<13:(A+(X=B))>>, X end,
  141: 	  "begin A = 4, B = 28, <<13:(A+(X=B))>>, X end.",
  142: 	  28),
  143:     ok.
  144: 
  145: %% binary match problems.
  146: match_bin(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  147:     check(fun() -> <<"abc">> = <<"abc">> end,
  148: 	  "<<\"abc\">> = <<\"abc\">>. ",
  149: 	  <<"abc">>),
  150:     check(fun() ->
  151: 		  <<Size,B:Size/binary,Rest/binary>> = <<2,"AB","CD">>,
  152: 		  {Size,B,Rest}
  153: 	  end,
  154: 	  "begin <<Size,B:Size/binary,Rest/binary>> = <<2,\"AB\",\"CD\">>, "
  155: 	  "{Size,B,Rest} end. ",
  156: 	  {2,<<"AB">>,<<"CD">>}),
  157:     ok.
  158: 
  159: %% OTP-3144: compile-time expressions in pattern.
  160: pattern_expr(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  161:     check(fun() -> case 4 of 2+2 -> ok end end,
  162: 	  "case 4 of 2+2 -> ok end. ",
  163: 	  ok),
  164:     check(fun() -> case 2 of +2 -> ok end end,
  165: 	  "case 2 of +2 -> ok end. ",
  166: 	  ok),
  167:     ok.
  168: 
  169: %% OTP-4518.
  170: guard_3(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  171:     check(fun() -> if false -> false; true -> true end end,
  172: 	  "if false -> false; true -> true end.",
  173: 	  true),
  174:     check(fun() -> if <<"hej">> == <<"hopp">> -> true;
  175: 		      true -> false end end,
  176: 	  "begin if <<\"hej\">> == <<\"hopp\">> -> true;
  177:                           true -> false end end.",
  178:                 false),
  179:     check(fun() -> if <<"hej">> == <<"hej">> -> true;
  180: 		      true -> false end end,
  181: 	  "begin if <<\"hej\">> == <<\"hej\">> -> true;
  182:                           true -> false end end.",
  183:                 true),
  184:     ok.
  185: 
  186: %% OTP-4885.
  187: guard_4(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  188:     check(fun() -> if erlang:'+'(3,a) -> true ; true -> false end end,
  189: 	  "if erlang:'+'(3,a) -> true ; true -> false end.",
  190: 	  false),
  191:     check(fun() -> if erlang:is_integer(3) -> true ; true -> false end
  192: 	  end,
  193: 	  "if erlang:is_integer(3) -> true ; true -> false end.",
  194: 	  true),
  195:     check(fun() -> [X || X <- [1,2,3], erlang:is_integer(X)] end,
  196: 	  "[X || X <- [1,2,3], erlang:is_integer(X)].",
  197: 	  [1,2,3]),
  198:     check(fun() -> if is_atom(is_integer(a)) -> true ; true -> false end
  199: 	  end,
  200: 	  "if is_atom(is_integer(a)) -> true ; true -> false end.",
  201: 	  true),
  202:     check(fun() -> if erlang:is_atom(erlang:is_integer(a)) -> true;
  203: 		      true -> false end end,
  204: 	  "if erlang:is_atom(erlang:is_integer(a)) -> true; "
  205: 	  "true -> false end.",
  206: 	  true),
  207:     check(fun() -> if is_atom(3+a) -> true ; true -> false end end,
  208: 	  "if is_atom(3+a) -> true ; true -> false end.",
  209: 	  false),
  210:     check(fun() -> if erlang:is_atom(3+a) -> true ; true -> false end
  211: 	  end,
  212: 	  "if erlang:is_atom(3+a) -> true ; true -> false end.",
  213: 	  false),
  214:     ok.
  215: 
  216: 
  217: %% OTP-4518.
  218: lc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  219:     check(fun() -> X = 32, [X || X <- [1,2,3]] end,
  220: 	  "begin X = 32, [X || X <- [1,2,3]] end.",
  221: 	  [1,2,3]),
  222:     check(fun() -> X = 32,
  223: 		   [X || <<X:X>> <- [<<1:32>>,<<2:32>>,<<3:8>>]] end,
  224: 	  %% "binsize variable"          ^
  225: 	  "begin X = 32,
  226:                  [X || <<X:X>> <- [<<1:32>>,<<2:32>>,<<3:8>>]] end.",
  227:                 [1,2]),
  228:     check(fun() -> Y = 13,[X || {X,Y} <- [{1,2}]] end,
  229: 	  "begin Y = 13,[X || {X,Y} <- [{1,2}]] end.",
  230: 	  [1]),
  231:     error_check("begin [A || X <- [{1,2}], 1 == A] end.",
  232: 		{unbound_var,'A'}),
  233:     error_check("begin X = 32,
  234:                         [{Y,W} || X <- [1,2,32,Y=4], Z <- [1,2,W=3]] end.",
  235:                       {unbound_var,'Y'}),
  236:     error_check("begin X = 32,<<A:B>> = <<100:X>> end.",
  237: 		{unbound_var,'B'}),
  238:     check(fun() -> [X || X <- [1,2,3,4], not (X < 2)] end,
  239: 	  "begin [X || X <- [1,2,3,4], not (X < 2)] end.",
  240: 	  [2,3,4]),
  241:     check(fun() -> [X || X <- [true,false], X] end,
  242: 	  "[X || X <- [true,false], X].", [true]),
  243:     ok.
  244: 
  245: zlc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  246:     check(fun() ->
  247:                   X = 32, Y = 32, [{X, Y} || X <- [1,2,3] && Y <- [4,5,6]]
  248:           end,
  249:           "begin X = 32, Y = 32, [{X, Y} || X <- [1,2,3] && Y <- [4,5,6]] end.",
  250:           [{1,4},{2,5},{3,6}]),
  251:     check(fun() ->
  252:                   S1 = [x, y, z], S2 = [5, 10, 15], X = 32, Y = 32,
  253:                   [{X, Y} || X <- S1 && Y <- S2]
  254:           end,
  255:           "begin
  256:         S1 = [x, y, z], S2 = [5, 10, 15], X = 32, Y = 32,
  257:           [{X, Y} || X <- S1 && Y <- S2]
  258:           end.",
  259:     [{x,5}, {y,10}, {z,15}]),
  260:     check(fun() ->
  261:                   [{X, Y, K} || X <- [1,2,3] &&  Y:=K <- #{1=>a, 2=>b, 3=>c}]
  262:           end,
  263:           "begin [{X, Y, K} || X <- [1,2,3] &&  Y:=K <- #{1=>a, 2=>b, 3=>c}] end.",
  264:           [{1,1,a},{2,2,b},{3,3,c}]),
  265:     check(fun() ->
  266:                 [{X, W+Y} || X <- [a, b, c] && <<Y>> <= <<2, 4, 6>>, W <- [1,2]]
  267:         end,
  268:         "begin [{X, W+Y} || X <- [a, b, c] && <<Y>> <= <<2, 4, 6>>, W <- [1,2]] end.",
  269:         [{a,3}, {a,4}, {b,5}, {b,6}, {c,7}, {c,8}]),
  270:     check(fun() ->
  271:             [{X, W+Y} || W <- [0], X <- [a, b, c] && <<Y>> <= <<2, 4, 6>>, Y<4]
  272:     end,
  273:     "begin [{X, W+Y} || W <- [0], X <- [a, b, c] && <<Y>> <= <<2, 4, 6>>, Y<4] end.",
  274:     [{a,2}]),
  275:     check(fun() ->
  276:             [{X,Y}|| a=b=X <- [1,2] && Y <-[1,2]] end,
  277:         "begin [{X,Y}|| a=b=X <- [1,2] && Y <-[1,2]] end.",
  278:         []),
  279:     check(fun() ->
  280:         [{A,B,W} || {Same,W} <- [{a,1}],
  281:             {Same,A} <- [{a,1},{b,9},{x,10}] && {Same,B} <- [{a,7},{wrong,8},{x,20}]]
  282:         end,
  283:         "begin [{A,B,W} || {Same,W} <- [{a,1}],
  284:             {Same,A} <- [{a,1},{b,9},{x,10}] && {Same,B} <- [{a,7},{wrong,8},{x,20}]]
  285:         end.",
  286:         [{1,7,1},{10,20,1}]),
  287:     error_check("[X || X <- a && Y <- [1]].",{bad_generators,{a,[1]}}),
  288:     error_check("[{X,Y} || X <- a && <<Y>> <= <<1,2>>].",{bad_generators,{a,<<1,2>>}}),
  289:     error_check("[{X,V} || X <- a && _K := V <- #{b=>3}].",{bad_generators,{a,#{b=>3}}}),
  290:     error_check("begin
  291:         X = 32, Y = 32, [{X, Y} || X <- [1,2,3] && Y <- [4]] end.",
  292:     {bad_generators,{[2,3],[]}}),
  293:     error_check("begin
  294:         X = 32, Y = 32, [{X, Y} || X <- [1,2,3] && Y:=_V <- #{1=>1}] end.",
  295:     {bad_generators,{[2,3],#{}}}),
  296:     ok.
  297: 
  298: zbc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  299:     check(fun() ->
  300:                   <<3, 4, 5>>
  301:           end,
  302:           "begin
  303:         X = 32, Y = 32,
  304:           << <<(X+Y)/integer>> || <<X>> <= <<1,2,3>> && <<Y>> <= <<2,2,2>> >>
  305:               end.",
  306:         <<3, 4, 5>>),
  307:     check(fun() ->
  308:                   <<4,5,6,5,6,7,6,7,8>>
  309:           end,
  310:           "begin
  311:         X = 32, Y = 32, Z = 32,
  312:           << <<(X+Y+Z)/integer>> || <<X>> <= <<1,2,3>> && <<Y>> <= <<2,2,2>>, Z<-[1,2,3] >>
  313:               end.",
  314:         <<4,5,6,5,6,7,6,7,8>>),
  315:     check(fun() ->
  316:                   <<4, 5, 6>>
  317:           end,
  318:           "begin
  319:         L1 = <<1, 2, 3>>, L2 = <<1, 1, 1>>, L3 = <<2, 2, 2>>,
  320:           << <<(X+Y+Z)/integer>> || <<X>> <= L1 && <<Y>> <= L2 && <<Z>> <= L3 >>
  321:               end.",
  322:     <<4, 5, 6>>),
  323:     check(fun() ->
  324:          << <<(X+Y):64>>|| a=b=X <- [1,2] && Y <- [1,2] >> end,
  325:         "begin << <<(X+Y):64>>|| a=b=X <- [1,2] && Y <- [1,2] >> end.",
  326:         <<>>),
  327:     check(fun() ->
  328:          << <<(X+Y):64>>|| a=b=X <- [1,2] && <<Y>> <= <<1,2>> >> end,
  329:         "begin << <<(X+Y):64>>|| a=b=X <- [1,2] && <<Y>> <= <<1,2>> >> end.",
  330:         <<>>),
  331:     check(fun() ->
  332:          << <<(X+V):64>>|| a=b=X <- [1,2] && _K:=V <- #{a=>1,b=>2}>> end,
  333:         "begin << <<(X+V):64>>|| a=b=X <- [1,2] && _K:=V <- #{a=>1,b=>2}>> end.",
  334:         <<>>),
  335:     check(fun() ->
  336:          << <<X:32>> || <<X:bad>> <= <<1,2,3>> && <<Y>> <= <<1,2,3>> >> end,
  337:         "begin << <<X:32, Y:32>> || <<X:bad>> <= <<1,2,3>> && <<Y>> <= <<1,2,3>> >> end.",
  338:         <<>>),
  339:     error_check("begin << <<X>> || <<X>> <= a && Y <- [1]>> end.",{bad_generators,{a,[1]}}),
  340:     error_check("begin
  341:         X = 32, Y = 32,
  342:                 << <<(X+Y)/integer>> || X <- [1,2] && Y <- [1,2,3,4]>>
  343:                     end.",
  344:     {bad_generators,{[],[3,4]}}),
  345:     error_check("begin << <<X:8>> || X <- [1] && Y <- a && <<Z>> <= <<2>> >> end.",
  346:         {bad_generators,{[1], a, <<2>>}}),
  347:     ok.
  348: 
  349: zmc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  350:     check(fun() ->
  351:                   [{a,b,1,3}]
  352:           end,
  353:           "begin
  354:         M1 = #{a=>1}, M2 = #{b=>3},
  355:           [{K1, K2, V1, V2} || K1 := V1 <- M1 && K2 := V2 <- M2]
  356:           end.",
  357:     [{a,b,1,3}]),
  358:     check(fun() ->
  359:                   [A * 4 || A <- lists:seq(1, 50)]
  360:           end,
  361:           "begin
  362:         Seq = lists:seq(1, 50),
  363:           M1 = maps:iterator(#{X=>X || X <- Seq}, ordered),
  364:           M2 = maps:iterator(#{X=>X || X <- lists:seq(1,50)}, ordered),
  365:           [X+Y+Z+W || X := Y <- M1 && Z := W <- M2]
  366:           end.",
  367:     [A * 4 || A <- lists:seq(1, 50)]),
  368:     check(fun() ->
  369:                   [{A, A*3, A*2, A*4} || A <- lists:seq(1, 50)]
  370:           end,
  371:           "begin
  372:         Seq = lists:seq(1, 50),
  373:           M3 = maps:iterator(#{X=>X*3 || X <- Seq}, ordered),
  374:           M4 = maps:iterator(#{X*2=>X*4 || X <- Seq}, ordered),
  375:           [{X, Y, Z, W} || X := Y <- M3 && Z := W <- M4]
  376:           end.",
  377:     [{A, A*3, A*2, A*4} || A <- lists:seq(1, 50)]),
  378:     check(fun() ->
  379:                   #{K1 => V1+V2 || K1:=V1 <- #{a=>1} && _K2:=V2 <- #{b=>3}}
  380:           end,
  381:           "begin
  382:         #{K1 => V1+V2 || K1:=V1 <- #{a=>1} && _K2:=V2 <- #{b=>3}}
  383:           end.",
  384:     #{a=>4}),
  385:     check(fun() ->
  386:                   #{K=>V || a := b <- #{x => y} && K := V <- #{x => y}}
  387:           end,
  388:           "begin
  389:         #{K=>V || a := b <- #{x => y} && K := V <- #{x => y}}
  390:           end.",
  391:     #{}),
  392:     error_check("begin
  393:         #{K1 => V1+V2 || K1:=V1 <- #{a=>1} &&
  394:                              _K2:=V2 <- maps:iterator(#{b=>3,c=>4}, ordered)}
  395:                 end.",
  396:     {bad_generators,{#{},#{c=>4}}}),
  397:     error_check("begin #{X=>Y || X <- [1] && Y <- a && K1:=V1 <- #{b=>3}} end.",
  398:         {bad_generators,{[1], a, #{b=>3}}}),
  399:     ok.
  400: 
  401: %% Simple cases, just to cover some code.
  402: simple_cases(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  403:     check(fun() -> A = $C end, "A = $C.", $C),
  404:     %% check(fun() -> A = 3.14 end, "A = 3.14.", 3.14),
  405:     check(fun() -> self() ! a, A = receive a -> true end end,
  406: 	  "begin self() ! a, A = receive a -> true end end.",
  407: 	  true),
  408:     check(fun() -> c:flush(), self() ! a, self() ! b, self() ! c,
  409: 		   receive b -> b end,
  410: 		   {messages, [a,c]} =
  411: 		       erlang:process_info(self(), messages),
  412: 		   c:flush() end,
  413: 	  "begin c:flush(), self() ! a, self() ! b, self() ! c,"
  414: 	  "receive b -> b end,"
  415: 	  "{messages, [a,c]} ="
  416: 	  "     erlang:process_info(self(), messages), c:flush() end.",
  417: 	  ok),
  418:     check(fun() -> self() ! a, A = receive a -> true
  419: 				   after 0 -> false end end,
  420: 	  "begin self() ! a, A = receive a -> true"
  421: 	  "                      after 0 -> false end end.",
  422: 	  true),
  423:     check(fun() -> c:flush(), self() ! a, self() ! b, self() ! c,
  424: 		   receive b -> b after 0 -> true end,
  425: 		   {messages, [a,c]} =
  426: 		       erlang:process_info(self(), messages),
  427: 		   c:flush() end,
  428: 	  "begin c:flush(), self() ! a, self() ! b, self() ! c,"
  429: 	  "receive b -> b after 0 -> true end,"
  430: 	  "{messages, [a,c]} ="
  431: 	  "     erlang:process_info(self(), messages), c:flush() end.",
  432: 	  ok),
  433:     check(fun() -> receive _ -> true after 10 -> false end end,
  434: 	  "receive _ -> true after 10 -> false end.",
  435: 	  false),
  436:     check(fun() -> F = fun(A) -> A end, true = 3 == F(3) end,
  437: 	  "begin F = fun(A) -> A end, true = 3 == F(3) end.",
  438: 	  true),
  439:     check(fun() -> F = fun(A) -> A end, true = 3 == apply(F, [3]) end,
  440: 	  "begin F = fun(A) -> A end, true = 3 == apply(F,[3]) end.",
  441: 	  true),
  442:     check(fun() -> catch throw(a) end, "catch throw(a).", a),
  443:     check(fun() -> catch a end, "catch a.", a),
  444:     check(fun() -> 4 == 3 end, "4 == 3.", false),
  445:     check(fun() -> not true end, "not true.", false),

  626: %% OTP-4929. Unary plus rejects non-numbers.
  627: unary_plus(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  628:     check(fun() -> F = fun(X) -> + X end,

  631: 	  "      true = -1 == F(-1) end.", true, ['F'], none, none),
  632:     error_check("+a.", badarith),
  633:     ok.

  637:     error_check("[X || X <- [[1],[2]],
  638:                              begin L = length, L(X) =:= 1 end].",
  639:                       {badfun,length}),

  662:                 7),

  858:     check(fun() -> [ 3 || <<17/float>> <= <<17.0/float>>] end,
  859:                 "[ 3 || <<17/float>> <= <<17.0/float>>].",
  860:                 [3]),
  861:     check(fun() -> [ 3 || <<17/float>> <- [<<17.0/float>>]] end,
  862:                 "[ 3 || <<17/float>> <- [<<17.0/float>>]].",
  863:                 [3]),
  864:     check(fun() -> [ X || <<17/float,X:3>> <= <<17.0/float,2:3>>] end,
  865:                 "[ X || <<17/float,X:3>> <= <<17.0/float,2:3>>].",
  866:                 [2]),
  867:     check(fun() ->
  868:                  [ foo || <<(1 bsl 1023)/float>> <= <<(1 bsl 1023)/float>>]
  869:                 end,
  870:                 "[ foo || <<(1 bsl 1023)/float>> <= <<(1 bsl 1023)/float>>].",
  871:                 [foo]),
  872:     check(fun() ->
  873:                  [ foo || <<(1 bsl 1023)/float>> <- [<<(1 bsl 1023)/float>>]]
  874:                 end,
  875:                "[ foo || <<(1 bsl 1023)/float>> <- [<<(1 bsl 1023)/float>>]].",
  876:                 [foo]),
  877:     error_check("[ foo || <<(1 bsl 1024)/float>> <-
  878:                             [<<(1 bsl 1024)/float>>]].",
  879:                       badarg),
  880:     check(fun() ->
  881:                  [ foo || <<(1 bsl 1024)/float>> <- [<<(1 bsl 1023)/float>>]]
  882:                 end,
  883:                 "[ foo || <<(1 bsl 1024)/float>> <-
  884:                             [<<(1 bsl 1023)/float>>]].",
  885:                 []),
  886:     check(fun() ->
  887:                  [ foo || <<(1 bsl 1024)/float>> <= <<(1 bsl 1023)/float>>]
  888:                 end,
  889:                 "[ foo || <<(1 bsl 1024)/float>> <=
  890:                             <<(1 bsl 1023)/float>>].",
  891:                 []),
  892:     check(fun() ->
  893:                         L = 8,
  894:                         [{L,B} || <<L:L,B:L/float>> <= <<32:8,7:32/float>>]
  895:                 end,
  896:                 "begin L = 8,
  897:                        [{L,B} || <<L:L,B:L/float>> <= <<32:8,7:32/float>>]
  898:                  end.",
  899:                 [{32,7.0}]),
  900:     check(fun() ->
  901:                         L = 8,
  902:                         [{L,B} || <<L:L,B:L/float>> <- [<<32:8,7:32/float>>]]
  903:                 end,
  904:                 "begin L = 8,
  905:                        [{L,B} || <<L:L,B:L/float>> <- [<<32:8,7:32/float>>]]
  906:                  end.",
  907:                 [{32,7.0}]),
  908:     check(fun() ->
  909:                         [foo || <<"s">> <= <<"st">>]
  910:                 end,
  911:                 "[foo || <<\"s\">> <= <<\"st\">>].",
  912:                 [foo]),
  913:     check(fun() -> <<_:32>> = <<17:32>> end,
  914:                 "<<_:32>> = <<17:32>>.",
  915:                 <<17:32>>),
  916:     check(fun() -> [foo || <<_:32>> <= <<17:32,20:32>>] end,
  917:                 "[foo || <<_:32>> <= <<17:32,20:32>>].",
  918:                 [foo,foo]),
  919: 
  920:     check(fun() -> << <<X:32>> || X <- [1,2,3], X > 1 >> end,
  921:                 "<< <<X:32>> || X <- [1,2,3], X > 1 >>.",
  922:                 <<0,0,0,2,0,0,0,3>>),
  923:     error_check("[X || <<X>> <= [a,b]].",{bad_generator,[a,b]}),
  924:     ok.
  925: 
  926: %% OTP-6787. bitlevel binaries.
  927: otp_6787(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  928:     check(
  929:             fun() -> <<16:(1024*1024)>> = <<16:(1024*1024)>> end,
  930:             "<<16:(1024*1024)>> = <<16:(1024*1024)>>.",
  931:             <<16:1048576>>),
  932:     ok.
  933: 
  934: %% OTP-6977. ++ bug.
  935: otp_6977(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  936:     check(
  937:             fun() -> (fun([$X] ++ _) -> ok end)("X") end,
  938:             "(fun([$X] ++ _) -> ok end)(\"X\").",
  939:             ok),
  940:     ok.
  941: 
  942: %% OTP-7550. Support for UTF-8, UTF-16, UTF-32.
  943: otp_7550(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  944: 
  945:     %% UTF-8.
  946:     check(
  947: 	    fun() -> <<65>> = <<65/utf8>> end,
  948: 	    "<<65>> = <<65/utf8>>.",
  949: 	    <<65>>),
  950:     check(
  951: 	    fun() -> <<350/utf8>> = <<197,158>> end,
  952: 	    "<<350/utf8>> = <<197,158>>.",
  953: 	    <<197,158>>),
  954:     check(
  955: 	    fun() -> <<$b,$j,$\303,$\266,$r,$n>> = <<"bj\366rn"/utf8>> end,
  956: 	    "<<$b,$j,$\303,$\266,$r,$n>> = <<\"bj\366rn\"/utf8>>.",
  957: 	    <<$b,$j,$\303,$\266,$r,$n>>),
  958: 
  959:     %% UTF-16.
  960:     check(
  961: 	    fun() -> <<0,65>> = <<65/utf16>> end,
  962: 	    "<<0,65>> = <<65/utf16>>.",
  963: 	    <<0,65>>),
  964:     check(
  965: 	    fun() -> <<16#D8,16#08,16#DF,16#45>> = <<16#12345/utf16>> end,
  966: 	    "<<16#D8,16#08,16#DF,16#45>> = <<16#12345/utf16>>.",
  967: 	    <<16#D8,16#08,16#DF,16#45>>),
  968:     check(
  969: 	    fun() -> <<16#08,16#D8,16#45,16#DF>> = <<16#12345/little-utf16>> end,
  970: 	    "<<16#08,16#D8,16#45,16#DF>> = <<16#12345/little-utf16>>.",
  971: 	    <<16#08,16#D8,16#45,16#DF>>),
  972: 
  973:     check(
  974: 	    fun() -> <<350/utf16>> = <<1,94>> end,
  975: 	    "<<350/utf16>> = <<1,94>>.",
  976: 	    <<1,94>>),
  977:     check(
  978: 	    fun() -> <<350/little-utf16>> = <<94,1>> end,
  979: 	    "<<350/little-utf16>> = <<94,1>>.",
  980: 	    <<94,1>>),
  981:     check(
  982: 	    fun() -> <<16#12345/utf16>> = <<16#D8,16#08,16#DF,16#45>> end,
  983: 	    "<<16#12345/utf16>> = <<16#D8,16#08,16#DF,16#45>>.",
  984: 	    <<16#D8,16#08,16#DF,16#45>>),
  985:     check(
  986: 	    fun() -> <<16#12345/little-utf16>> = <<16#08,16#D8,16#45,16#DF>> end,
  987: 	    "<<16#12345/little-utf16>> = <<16#08,16#D8,16#45,16#DF>>.",
  988: 	    <<16#08,16#D8,16#45,16#DF>>),
  989: 
  990:     %% UTF-32.
  991:     check(
  992: 	    fun() -> <<16#12345/utf32>> = <<16#0,16#01,16#23,16#45>> end,
  993: 	    "<<16#12345/utf32>> = <<16#0,16#01,16#23,16#45>>.",
  994: 	    <<16#0,16#01,16#23,16#45>>),
  995:     check(
  996: 	    fun() -> <<16#0,16#01,16#23,16#45>> = <<16#12345/utf32>> end,
  997: 	    "<<16#0,16#01,16#23,16#45>> = <<16#12345/utf32>>.",
  998: 	    <<16#0,16#01,16#23,16#45>>),
  999:     check(
 1000: 	    fun() -> <<16#12345/little-utf32>> = <<16#45,16#23,16#01,16#00>> end,
 1001: 	    "<<16#12345/little-utf32>> = <<16#45,16#23,16#01,16#00>>.",
 1002: 	    <<16#45,16#23,16#01,16#00>>),
 1003:     check(
 1004: 	    fun() -> <<16#12345/little-utf32>> end,
 1005: 	    "<<16#12345/little-utf32>>.",
 1006: 	    <<16#45,16#23,16#01,16#00>>),
 1007: 
 1008:     %% Mixed.
 1009:     check(
 1010: 	    fun() -> <<16#41,16#12345/utf32,16#0391:16,16#2E:8>> end,
 1011: 	    "<<16#41,16#12345/utf32,16#0391:16,16#2E:8>>.",
 1012: 	    <<16#41,16#00,16#01,16#23,16#45,16#03,16#91,16#2E>>),
 1013:     ok.
 1014: 
 1015: 
 1016: %% OTP-8133. Bit comprehension bug.
 1017: otp_8133(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1018:     check(
 1019:             fun() ->
 1020:                   E = fun(N) ->
 1021:                               if
 1022:                                   is_integer(N) -> <<N/integer>>;
 1023:                                   true -> throw(foo)
 1024:                               end
 1025:                       end,
 1026:                   try << << (E(V))/binary >> || V <- [1,2,3,a] >>
 1027:                   catch foo -> ok
 1028:                   end
 1029:             end,
 1030:             "begin
 1031:                  E = fun(N) ->
 1032:                             if is_integer(N) -> <<N/integer>>;
 1033:                                true -> throw(foo)
 1034:                             end
 1035:                      end,
 1036:                  try << << (E(V))/binary >> || V <- [1,2,3,a] >>
 1037:                  catch foo -> ok
 1038:                  end
 1039:              end.",
 1040:             ok),
 1041:     check(
 1042:             fun() ->
 1043:                   E = fun(N) ->
 1044:                               if
 1045:                                   is_integer(N) -> <<N/integer>>;
 1046:                                   true -> erlang:error(foo)
 1047:                               end
 1048:                       end,
 1049:                   try << << (E(V))/binary >> || V <- [1,2,3,a] >>
 1050:                   catch error:foo -> ok
 1051:                   end
 1052:             end,
 1053:             "begin
 1054:                  E = fun(N) ->
 1055:                             if is_integer(N) -> <<N/integer>>;
 1056:                                true -> erlang:error(foo)
 1057:                             end
 1058:                      end,
 1059:                  try << << (E(V))/binary >> || V <- [1,2,3,a] >>
 1060:                  catch error:foo -> ok
 1061:                  end
 1062:              end.",
 1063:             ok),
 1064:     ok.
 1065: 
 1066: %% Simple cases, just to cover some code.
 1067: funs(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1068:     do_funs(none, none),
 1069:     do_funs(lfh(), none),
 1070:     do_funs(lfh(), efh()),
 1071: 
 1072:     error_check("nix:foo().", {access_not_allowed,nix}, lfh(), efh()),
 1073:     error_check("bar().", undef, none, none),
 1074: 
 1075:     check(fun() -> F1 = fun(F,N) -> ?MODULE:count_down(F, N) end,
 1076:                          F1(F1, 1000) end,
 1077:                 "begin F1 = fun(F,N) -> count_down(F, N) end,"
 1078:                 "F1(F1,1000) end.",
 1079: 		0, ['F1'], lfh(), none),
 1080: 
 1081:     check(fun() -> F1 = fun(F,N) -> ?MODULE:count_down(F, N) end,
 1082:                          F1(F1, 1000) end,
 1083:                 "begin F1 = fun(F,N) -> count_down(F, N) end,"
 1084:                 "F1(F1,1000) end.",
 1085: 		0, ['F1'], lfh_value(), none),
 1086: 
 1087:     check(fun() -> F1 = fun(F,N) -> ?MODULE:count_down(F, N) end,
 1088:                          F1(F1, 1000) end,
 1089:                 "begin F1 = fun(F,N) -> count_down(F, N) end,"
 1090:                 "F1(F1,1000) end.",
 1091: 		0, ['F1'], lfh_value_extra(), none),
 1092: 
 1093:     check(fun() -> F1 = fun(F,N) -> ?MODULE:count_down(F, N) end,
 1094:                          F1(F1, 1000) end,
 1095:                 "begin F1 = fun(F,N) -> count_down(F, N) end,"
 1096:                 "F1(F1,1000) end.",
 1097: 		0, ['F1'], {?MODULE,local_func_value}, none),
 1098:     %% This is not documented, and only for backward compatibility (good!).
 1099:     B0 = erl_eval:new_bindings(),
 1100:     check(fun() -> is_function(?MODULE:count_down_fun()) end,
 1101:                 "begin is_function(count_down_fun()) end.",
 1102:                 true, [], {?MODULE,local_func,[B0]},none),
 1103: 
 1104:     EF = fun({timer,sleep}, As) when length(As) == 1 -> exit({got_it,sleep});
 1105:             ({M,F}, As) -> apply(M, F, As)
 1106:          end,
 1107:     EFH = {value, EF},
 1108:     error_check("apply(timer, sleep, [1]).", got_it, none, EFH),
 1109:     error_check("begin F = fun(T) -> timer:sleep(T) end,F(1) end.",
 1110:                       got_it, none, EFH),
 1111:     error_check("fun c/1.", undef),
 1112:     error_check("fun a:b/0().", undef),
 1113: 
 1114:     MaxArgs = 20,
 1115:     [true] =
 1116:         lists:usort([run_many_args(SAs) || SAs <- many_args(MaxArgs)]),
 1117:     {'EXIT',{{argument_limit,_},_}} =
 1118:         (catch run_many_args(many_args1(MaxArgs+1))),
 1119:     ok.
 1120: 
 1121: run_many_args({S, As}) ->
 1122:     apply(eval_string(S), As) =:= As.
 1123: 
 1124: many_args(N) ->
 1125:     [many_args1(I) || I <- lists:seq(1, N)].
 1126: 
 1127: many_args1(N) ->
 1128:     F = fun(L, P) ->
 1129:                 tl(lists:flatten([","++P++integer_to_list(E) || E <- L]))
 1130:         end,
 1131:     L = lists:seq(1, N),
 1132:     T = F(L, "V"),
 1133:     S = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("fun(~s) -> [~s] end.", [T, T])),
 1134:     {S, L}.
 1135: 
 1136: do_funs(LFH, EFH) ->
 1137:     %% LFH is not really used by these examples...
 1138: 
 1139:     %% These tests do not prove that tail recursive functions really
 1140:     %% work (that the process does not grow); one should also run them
 1141:     %% manually with 1000 replaced by 1000000.
 1142: 
 1143:     M = atom_to_list(?MODULE),
 1144:     check(fun() -> F1 = fun(F,N) -> ?MODULE:count_down(F, N) end,
 1145:                          F1(F1, 1000) end,
 1146:                 concat(["begin F1 = fun(F,N) -> ", M,
 1147:                         ":count_down(F, N) end, F1(F1,1000) end."]),
 1148: 		0, ['F1'], LFH, EFH),
 1149:     check(fun() -> F1 = fun(F,N) -> apply(?MODULE,count_down,[F,N])
 1150:                               end, F1(F1, 1000) end,
 1151:                 concat(["begin F1 = fun(F,N) -> apply(", M,
 1152:                         ",count_down,[F, N]) end, F1(F1,1000) end."]),
 1153: 		0, ['F1'], LFH, EFH),
 1154:     check(fun() -> F = fun(F,N) when N > 0 -> apply(F,[F,N-1]);
 1155:                                 (_F,0) -> ok end,
 1156:                          F(F, 1000)
 1157:                 end,
 1158:                 "begin F = fun(F,N) when N > 0 -> apply(F,[F,N-1]);"
 1159:                              "(_F,0) -> ok end,"
 1160:                        "F(F, 1000) end.",
 1161:                 ok, ['F'], LFH, EFH),
 1162:     check(fun() -> F = fun(F,N) when N > 0 ->
 1163:                                      apply(erlang,apply,[F,[F,N-1]]);
 1164:                                 (_F,0) -> ok end,
 1165:                          F(F, 1000)
 1166:                 end,
 1167:                 "begin F = fun(F,N) when N > 0 ->"
 1168:                                    "apply(erlang,apply,[F,[F,N-1]]);"
 1169:                              "(_F,0) -> ok end,"
 1170:                        "F(F, 1000) end.",
 1171:                 ok, ['F'], LFH, EFH),
 1172:     check(fun() -> F = count_down_fun(),
 1173:                          SF = fun(SF, F1, N) -> F(SF, F1, N) end,
 1174:                          SF(SF, F, 1000) end,
 1175:                 concat(["begin F = ", M, ":count_down_fun(),"
 1176:                         "SF = fun(SF, F1, N) -> F(SF, F1, N) end,"
 1177:                         "SF(SF, F, 1000) end."]),
 1178:                 ok, ['F','SF'], LFH, EFH),
 1179: 
 1180: 
 1181:     check(fun() -> F = fun(X) -> A = 1+X, {X,A} end,
 1182:                          true = {2,3} == F(2) end,
 1183:                 "begin F = fun(X) -> A = 1+X, {X,A} end,
 1184:                        true = {2,3} == F(2) end.", true, ['F'], LFH, EFH),
 1185:     check(fun() -> F = fun(X) -> byte_size(X) end,
 1186:                          ?MODULE:do_apply(F,<<"hej">>) end,
 1187:                 concat(["begin F = fun(X) -> size(X) end,",
 1188:                         M,":do_apply(F,<<\"hej\">>) end."]),
 1189:                 3, ['F'], LFH, EFH),
 1190: 
 1191:     check(fun() -> F1 = fun(X, Z) -> {X,Z} end,
 1192:                          Z = 5,
 1193:                          F2 = fun(X, Y) -> F1(Z,{X,Y}) end,
 1194:                          F3 = fun(X, Y) -> {a,F1(Z,{X,Y})} end,
 1195:                          {5,{x,y}} = F2(x,y),
 1196:                          {a,{5,{y,x}}} = F3(y,x),
 1197:                          {5,{5,y}} = F2(Z,y),
 1198:                          true = {5,{x,5}} == F2(x,Z) end,
 1199:                 "begin F1 = fun(X, Z) -> {X,Z} end,
 1200:                        Z = 5,
 1201:                        F2 = fun(X, Y) -> F1(Z,{X,Y}) end,
 1202:                        F3 = fun(X, Y) -> {a,F1(Z,{X,Y})} end,
 1203:                        {5,{x,y}} = F2(x,y),
 1204:                        {a,{5,{y,x}}} = F3(y,x),
 1205:                        {5,{5,y}} = F2(Z,y),
 1206:                        true = {5,{x,5}} == F2(x,Z) end.",
 1207:                 true, ['F1','Z','F2','F3'], LFH, EFH),
 1208:     check(fun() -> F = fun(X) -> byte_size(X) end,
 1209:                          F2 = fun(Y) -> F(Y) end,
 1210:                          ?MODULE:do_apply(F2,<<"hej">>) end,
 1211:                 concat(["begin F = fun(X) -> size(X) end,",
 1212:                         "F2 = fun(Y) -> F(Y) end,",
 1213:                         M,":do_apply(F2,<<\"hej\">>) end."]),
 1214:                 3, ['F','F2'], LFH, EFH),
 1215:     check(fun() -> Z = 5, F = fun(X) -> {Z,X} end,
 1216:                          F2 = fun(Z) -> F(Z) end, F2(3) end,
 1217:                 "begin Z = 5, F = fun(X) -> {Z,X} end,
 1218:                        F2 = fun(Z) -> F(Z) end, F2(3) end.",
 1219:                 {5,3},['F','F2','Z'], LFH, EFH),
 1220:     check(fun() -> F = fun(Z) -> Z end,
 1221:                          F2 = fun(X) -> F(X), Z = {X,X}, Z end,
 1222:                          {1,1} = F2(1), Z = 7, Z end,
 1223:                 "begin F = fun(Z) -> Z end,
 1224:                        F2 = fun(X) -> F(X), Z = {X,X}, Z end,
 1225:                        {1,1} = F2(1), Z = 7, Z end.", 7, ['F','F2','Z'],
 1226:                 LFH, EFH),
 1227:     check(fun() -> F = fun(F, N) -> [?MODULE:count_down(F,N) || X <-[1]]
 1228:                              end, F(F,2) end,
 1229:                 concat(["begin F = fun(F, N) -> [", M,
 1230:                        ":count_down(F,N) || X <-[1]] end, F(F,2) end."]),
 1231:                 [[[0]]], ['F'], LFH, EFH),
 1232:     ok.
 1233: 
 1234: count_down(F, N) when N > 0 ->
 1235:     F(F, N-1);
 1236: count_down(_F, N) ->
 1237:     N.
 1238: 
 1239: count_down_fun() ->
 1240:     fun(SF,F,N) when N > 0 -> SF(SF,F,N-1);
 1241:        (_SF,_F,_N) -> ok
 1242:     end.
 1243: 
 1244: do_apply(F, V) ->
 1245:     F(V).
 1246: 
 1247: lfh() ->
 1248:     {eval, fun(F, As, Bs) -> local_func(F, As, Bs) end}.
 1249: 
 1250: local_func(F, As0, Bs0) when is_atom(F) ->
 1251:     {As,Bs} = erl_eval:expr_list(As0, Bs0, {eval,lfh()}),
 1252:     case erlang:function_exported(?MODULE, F, length(As)) of
 1253: 	true ->
 1254: 	    {value,apply(?MODULE, F, As),Bs};
 1255: 	false ->
 1256: 	    {value,apply(shell_default, F, As),Bs}
 1257:     end.
 1258: 
 1259: lfh_value_extra() ->
 1260:     %% Not documented.
 1261:     {value, fun(F, As) -> local_func_value(F, As) end, []}.
 1262: 
 1263: lfh_value() ->
 1264:     {value, fun(F, As) -> local_func_value(F, As) end}.
 1265: 
 1266: local_func_value(F, As) when is_atom(F) ->
 1267:     case erlang:function_exported(?MODULE, F, length(As)) of
 1268: 	true ->
 1269: 	    apply(?MODULE, F, As);
 1270: 	false ->
 1271: 	    apply(shell_default, F, As)
 1272:     end.
 1273: 
 1274: efh() ->
 1275:     {value, fun(F, As) -> external_func(F, As) end}.
 1276: 
 1277: external_func({M,_}, _As) when M == nix ->
 1278:     exit({{access_not_allowed,M},[mfa]});
 1279: external_func(F, As) when is_function(F) ->
 1280:     apply(F, As);
 1281: external_func({M,F}, As) ->
 1282:     apply(M, F, As).
 1283: 
 1284: 
 1285: 
 1286: %% Test try-of-catch-after-end statement.
 1287: try_catch(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1288:     %% Match in of with catch
 1289:     check(fun() -> try 1 of 1 -> 2 catch _:_ -> 3 end end,
 1290: 		"try 1 of 1 -> 2 catch _:_ -> 3 end.", 2),
 1291:     check(fun() -> try 1 of 1 -> 2; 3 -> 4 catch _:_ -> 5 end end,
 1292: 		"try 1 of 1 -> 2; 3 -> 4 catch _:_ -> 5 end.", 2),
 1293:     check(fun() -> try 3 of 1 -> 2; 3 -> 4 catch _:_ -> 5 end end,
 1294: 		"try 3 of 1 -> 2; 3 -> 4 catch _:_ -> 5 end.", 4),
 1295:     %% Just after
 1296:     check(fun () -> X = try 1 after put(try_catch, 2) end,
 1297: 			  {X,get(try_catch)} end,
 1298: 		"begin X = try 1 after put(try_catch, 2) end, "
 1299: 		"{X,get(try_catch)} end.", {1,2}),
 1300:     %% Match in of with after
 1301:     check(fun() -> X = try 1 of 1 -> 2 after put(try_catch, 3) end,
 1302: 			 {X,get(try_catch)} end,
 1303: 		"begin X = try 1 of 1 -> 2 after put(try_catch, 3) end, "
 1304: 		"{X,get(try_catch)} end.", {2,3}),
 1305:     check(fun() -> X = try 1 of 1 -> 2; 3 -> 4
 1306: 			     after put(try_catch, 5) end,
 1307: 			 {X,get(try_catch)} end,
 1308: 		"begin X = try 1 of 1 -> 2; 3 -> 4 "
 1309: 		"          after put(try_catch, 5) end, "
 1310: 		"      {X,get(try_catch)} end.", {2,5}),
 1311:     check(fun() -> X = try 3 of 1 -> 2; 3 -> 4
 1312: 			     after put(try_catch, 5) end,
 1313: 			 {X,get(try_catch)} end,
 1314: 		"begin X = try 3 of 1 -> 2; 3 -> 4 "
 1315: 		"          after put(try_catch, 5) end, "
 1316: 		"      {X,get(try_catch)} end.", {4,5}),
 1317:     %% Nomatch in of
 1318:     error_check("try 1 of 2 -> 3 catch _:_ -> 4 end.",
 1319: 		      {try_clause,1}),
 1320:     %% Nomatch in of with after
 1321:     check(fun () -> {'EXIT',{{try_clause,1},_}} =
 1322: 			      begin catch try 1 of 2 -> 3
 1323: 				          after put(try_catch, 4) end end,
 1324: 			  get(try_catch) end,
 1325: 		"begin {'EXIT',{{try_clause,1},_}} = "
 1326: 		"          begin catch try 1 of 2 -> 3 "
 1327: 		"                      after put(try_catch, 4) end end, "
 1328: 		"      get(try_catch) end. ", 4),
 1329:     %% Exception in try
 1330:     check(fun () -> try 1=2 catch error:{badmatch,2} -> 3 end end,
 1331: 		"try 1=2 catch error:{badmatch,2} -> 3 end.", 3),
 1332:     check(fun () -> try 1=2 of 3 -> 4
 1333: 			  catch error:{badmatch,2} -> 5 end end,
 1334: 		"try 1=2 of 3 -> 4 "
 1335: 		"catch error:{badmatch,2} -> 5 end.", 5),
 1336:     %% Exception in try with after
 1337:     check(fun () -> X = try 1=2
 1338: 			      catch error:{badmatch,2} -> 3
 1339: 			      after put(try_catch, 4) end,
 1340: 			  {X,get(try_catch)} end,
 1341: 		"begin X = try 1=2 "
 1342: 		"          catch error:{badmatch,2} -> 3 "
 1343: 		"          after put(try_catch, 4) end, "
 1344: 		"      {X,get(try_catch)} end. ", {3,4}),
 1345:     check(fun () -> X = try 1=2 of 3 -> 4
 1346: 			      catch error:{badmatch,2} -> 5
 1347: 			      after put(try_catch, 6) end,
 1348: 			  {X,get(try_catch)} end,
 1349: 		"begin X = try 1=2 of 3 -> 4"
 1350: 		"          catch error:{badmatch,2} -> 5 "
 1351: 		"          after put(try_catch, 6) end, "
 1352: 		"      {X,get(try_catch)} end. ", {5,6}),
 1353:     %% Uncaught exception
 1354:     error_check("try 1=2 catch error:undefined -> 3 end. ",
 1355: 		      {badmatch,2}),
 1356:     error_check("try 1=2 of 3 -> 4 catch error:undefined -> 5 end. ",
 1357: 		      {badmatch,2}),
 1358:     %% Uncaught exception with after
 1359:     check(fun () -> {'EXIT',{{badmatch,2},_}} =
 1360: 			      begin catch try 1=2
 1361: 					  after put(try_catch, 3) end end,
 1362: 			  get(try_catch) end,
 1363: 		"begin {'EXIT',{{badmatch,2},_}} = "
 1364: 		"          begin catch try 1=2 "
 1365: 		"                      after put(try_catch, 3) end end, "
 1366: 		"      get(try_catch) end. ", 3),
 1367:     check(fun () -> {'EXIT',{{badmatch,2},_}} =
 1368: 			      begin catch try 1=2 of 3 -> 4
 1369: 					  after put(try_catch, 5) end end,
 1370: 			  get(try_catch) end,
 1371: 		"begin {'EXIT',{{badmatch,2},_}} = "
 1372: 		"          begin catch try 1=2 of 3 -> 4"
 1373: 		"                      after put(try_catch, 5) end end, "
 1374: 		"      get(try_catch) end. ", 5),
 1375:     check(fun () -> {'EXIT',{{badmatch,2},_}} =
 1376: 			      begin catch try 1=2 catch error:undefined -> 3
 1377: 					  after put(try_catch, 4) end end,
 1378: 			  get(try_catch) end,
 1379: 		"begin {'EXIT',{{badmatch,2},_}} = "
 1380: 		"          begin catch try 1=2 catch error:undefined -> 3 "
 1381: 		"                      after put(try_catch, 4) end end, "
 1382: 		"      get(try_catch) end. ", 4),
 1383:     check(fun () -> {'EXIT',{{badmatch,2},_}} =
 1384: 			      begin catch try 1=2 of 3 -> 4
 1385: 					  catch error:undefined -> 5
 1386: 					  after put(try_catch, 6) end end,
 1387: 			  get(try_catch) end,
 1388: 		"begin {'EXIT',{{badmatch,2},_}} = "
 1389: 		"          begin catch try 1=2 of 3 -> 4 "
 1390: 		"                      catch error:undefined -> 5 "
 1391: 		"                      after put(try_catch, 6) end end, "
 1392: 		"      get(try_catch) end. ", 6),
 1393:     ok.
 1394: 
 1395: 
 1396: %% (OTP-7933).
 1397: eval_expr_5(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1398:     {ok,Tokens ,_} =
 1399: 	erl_scan:string("if a+4 == 4 -> yes; true -> no end. "),
 1400:     {ok, [Expr]} = erl_parse:parse_exprs(Tokens),
 1401:     {value, no, []} = erl_eval:expr(Expr, [], none, none, none),
 1402:     no = erl_eval:expr(Expr, [], none, none, value),
 1403:     try
 1404: 	erl_eval:expr(Expr, [], none, none, 4711),
 1405: 	function_clause = should_never_reach_here
 1406:     catch
 1407: 	error:function_clause ->
 1408: 	    ok
 1409:     end.
 1410: 
 1411: eep37(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1412:     check(fun () -> (fun _(X) -> X end)(42) end,
 1413:           "(fun _(X) -> X end)(42).",
 1414:           42),
 1415:     check(fun () -> (fun _Id(X) -> X end)(42) end,
 1416:           "(fun _Id(X) -> X end)(42).", 42),
 1417:     check(fun () -> is_function((fun Self() -> Self end)(), 0) end,
 1418:           "is_function((fun Self() -> Self end)(), 0).",
 1419:           true),
 1420:     check(fun () ->
 1421:                   F = fun Fact(N) when N > 0 ->
 1422:                               N * Fact(N - 1);
 1423:                           Fact(0) ->
 1424:                               1
 1425:                        end,
 1426:                   F(6)
 1427:           end,
 1428:           "(fun Fact(N) when N > 0 -> N * Fact(N - 1); Fact(0) -> 1 end)(6).",
 1429:           720),
 1430:     ok.
 1431: 
 1432: %% Check the string in different contexts: as is; in fun; from compiled code.
 1433: check(F, String, Result) ->
 1434:     check1(F, String, Result),
 1435:     FunString = concat(["fun() -> ", no_final_dot(String), " end(). "]),
 1436:     check1(F, FunString, Result),
 1437:     CompileString = concat(["hd(lists:map(fun(_) -> ", no_final_dot(String),
 1438:                             " end, [foo])). "]),
 1439:     check1(F, CompileString, Result).
 1440: 
 1441: check1(F, String, Result) ->
 1442:     Result = F(),
 1443:     case catch parse_and_run(String) of
 1444:         {value, Result, _} ->
 1445:             ok;
 1446:         Other ->
 1447:             ct:fail({eval, Other, Result})
 1448:     end.
 1449: 
 1450: check(F, String, Result, BoundVars, LFH, EFH) ->
 1451:     Result = F(),
 1452:     case catch parse_and_run(String, LFH, EFH) of
 1453:         {value, Result, Bs} ->
 1454:             %% We just assume that Bs is an orddict...
 1455:             Keys = orddict:fetch_keys(Bs),
 1456:             case sort(BoundVars) == Keys of
 1457:                 true ->
 1458:                     ok;
 1459:                 false ->
 1460:                     ct:fail({check, BoundVars, Keys})
 1461:             end,
 1462:             ok;
 1463:         Other ->
 1464:             ct:fail({check, Other, Result})
 1465:     end.
 1466: 
 1467: error_check(String, Result) ->
 1468:     case catch parse_and_run(String) of
 1469:         {'EXIT', {Result,_}} ->
 1470:             ok;
 1471:         Other ->
 1472:             ct:fail({eval, Other, Result})
 1473:     end.
 1474: 
 1475: error_check(String, Result, LFH, EFH) ->
 1476:     case catch parse_and_run(String, LFH, EFH) of
 1477:         {'EXIT', {Result,_}} ->
 1478:             ok;
 1479:         Other ->
 1480:             ct:fail({eval, Other, Result})
 1481:     end.
 1482: 
 1483: eval_string(String) ->
 1484:     {value, Result, _} = parse_and_run(String),
 1485:     Result.
 1486: 
 1487: parse_and_run(String) ->
 1488:     {ok,Tokens,_} = erl_scan:string(String),
 1489:     {ok, [Expr]} = erl_parse:parse_exprs(Tokens),
 1490:     erl_eval:expr(Expr, []).
 1491: 
 1492: parse_and_run(String, LFH, EFH) ->
 1493:     {ok,Tokens,_} = erl_scan:string(String),
 1494:     {ok, [Expr]} = erl_parse:parse_exprs(Tokens),
 1495:     erl_eval:expr(Expr, [], LFH, EFH).
 1496: 
 1497: no_final_dot(S) ->
 1498:     case lists:reverse(S) of
 1499:         " ." ++ R -> lists:reverse(R);
 1500:         "." ++ R -> lists:reverse(R);
 1501:         _ -> S
 1502:     end.
